English.alert_import_cronJob:
Tap OK to import into Cronios.

If Import Active Status is enabled in Cronios Settings, the cron job will run automatically when you enter `Run Continuously` mode in Cronios. Otherwise edit the cron job and tap Enable.

From the Edit screen, you can also adjust the cron schedule expression better suit the frequency of checks, which is currently set to every {{frequency}} minute(s).
English.alert_new_note:
You can share this note with other people.

If they add the name of a shortcut prefixed by ▶️, your shortcut will automatically run when you either:

• Run this shortcut

• Run this shortcut via Cronios.
English.alert_shortcuts_cache: Updating the list of shortcuts on this device. This may take a few moments.
English.alert_update_none: You are currently running the latest version of NoteCuts.
English.error_offline: You must be connected to the internet to check for updates.
English.label_shortcuts_available: Shortcuts containing the following keywords are available to run from this note:
English.label_shortcuts_availableAll: All shortcuts on this device can be run from this note.
English.menu_settings_cacheShortcuts_description: Refresh the cache whenever you add or remove shortcuts.
Get My Shortcuts action will be used to retrieve shortcuts (slower).
English.message_notify: I have some shortcuts for you to run. Open NoteCuts and tap Evaluate Local NoteCuts.
English.prompt_edit_shortcuts:
Enter the list of keywords (case-sensitive) that will match all shortcuts that can be triggered from this note.

Leave blank to allow any shortcut to run.

Separate shortcuts by new lines.
English.prompt_frequency:
Add or Update the cron job in Cronios

How often do you want this shortcut's cron job to run in Cronios? Check times begin from the top of the minute.
English.prompt_note_exists: A note with this name already exists. Associate it with NoteCuts?
English.prompt_new_note:
Enter the name for the new NoteCut. This will create a new note called:

`NoteCuts⚡️(XYZ)`

where XYZ is the name you enter.
English.prompt_open_note: Would you like to open the note?
English.prompt_remove: This operation will disassociate the note as a trigger for running shortcuts, but the actual note will not be affected.
English.prompt_trigger_type:
What kind of NoteCut Lets others trigger shortcuts to run on this device.

• Remote Trigger: Trigger and run shortcuts on remote iOS devices.
English.prompt_view_shortcuts: Select shortcuts to copy their names to the clipboard.
English.tip_notify: Notify people who have associated this note with a local NoteCut that shortcuts are ready to run.
